prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is an ecosystem of projects and tools for writing AI applications in plain human language. It includes a markup language called Book, an engine to run Book applications, and a web-based editor called Promptbook Studio.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}
